con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="QueryDataWebService" targetNamespace="urn:idm.openiam.org/srvc/qry/service" xmlns:ns1="http://cxf.apache.org/bindings/xformat" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="urn:idm.openiam.org/srvc/qry/service" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="urn:idm.openiam.org/srvc/qry/service" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="Query"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sql" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="maxRowCount" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="objectClass" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="paramList" nillable="true" type="tns:queryParam"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="queryParam"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="paramName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="paramType" type="tns:ParameterTypeEnum"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="paramValue" type="xs:anyType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="paramValueList" nillable="true" type="xs:anyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Response"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="errorCode" type="tns:ResponseErrorCode"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="responseValue" type="xs:anyType"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="status" type="tns:ResponseStatus" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="QueryListResponse"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:Response"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="resultList" nillable="true" type="xs:anyType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ParameterTypeEnum"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="string"/> <xs:enumeration value="date"/> <xs:enumeration value="timestamp"/> <xs:enumeration value="integer"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ResponseStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="success"/> <xs:enumeration value="failure"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ResponseErrorCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="objectNotFound"/> <xs:enumeration value="principalNotFound"/> <xs:enumeration value="userNotFound"/> <xs:enumeration value="userStatus"/> <xs:enumeration value="supervisorlNotFound"/> <xs:enumeration value="failPasswordPolicy"/> <xs:enumeration value="groupIdNull"/> <xs:enumeration value="groupIdInvalid"/> <xs:enumeration value="roleIdNull"/> <xs:enumeration value="roleIdInvalid"/> <xs:enumeration value="success"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_ALPHA_CHAR_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_LOWER_CASE_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_UPPER_CASE_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_NON_APHANUMERIC_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_NUMERIC_CHAR_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_HISTORY_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_LENGTH_RULE"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_NEQ_NAME"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_NEQ_PASSWORD"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_NEQ_PRINCIPAL"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_PASSWORD_CHANGE_FREQUENCY"/> <xs:enumeration value="PASSWORD_POLICY_NOT_FOUND"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_PASSWORD_CHANGE_ALLOW"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAIL_OTHER"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:element name="executeQuery" type="tns:executeQuery"/> <xs:complexType name="executeQuery"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="qry" type="tns:Query"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="executeQueryResponse" type="tns:executeQueryResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="executeQueryResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:QueryListResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="executeQuery"> <wsdl:part element="tns:executeQuery" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="executeQueryResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:executeQueryResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="QueryDataWebService"> <wsdl:operation name="executeQuery"> <wsdl:input message="tns:executeQuery" name="executeQuery"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:executeQueryResponse" name="executeQueryResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="QueryDataWebServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:QueryDataWebService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="executeQuery"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="executeQuery"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="executeQueryResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="QueryDataWebService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:QueryDataWebServiceSoapBinding" name="QueryDataWebServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/idm-ws/idmsrvc/QueryDataWebService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="urn:idm.openiam.org/srvc/qry/service"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:executeQuery> <!--Optional:--> <qry> <!--Optional:--> <sql>?</sql> <maxRowCount>?</maxRowCount> <!--Optional:--> <objectClass>?</objectClass> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <paramList> <!--Optional:--> <paramName>?</paramName> <!--Optional:--> <paramType>?</paramType> <!--Optional:--> <paramValue>?</paramValue> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <paramValueList>?</paramValueList> </paramList> </qry> </ser:executeQuery> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: executeQuery
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="urn:idm.openiam.org/srvc/qry/service"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:executeQuery> <!--Optional:--> <qry> <!--Optional:--> <sql>select u.USER_ID, u.FIRST_NAME, u.LAST_NAME, u.TITLE, u.DEPT_CD, u.CLASSIFICATION FROM USERS u, IDM_AUDIT_LOG log WHERE u.USER_ID = log.USER_ID</sql> <maxRowCount>100</maxRowCount> <!--Optional:--> <objectClass>org.openiam.idm.srvc.user.dto.User.class</objectClass> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <paramList> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <paramValue/> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <paramValueList/> </paramList> </qry> </ser:executeQuery> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
